sourcesContent:
export const colors = {
  primary: '#6C63FF',
  secondary: '#03DAC6',
  success: '#4CAF50',
  warning: '#FF9800',
  error: '#F44336',
  background: '#121212',
  surface: '#1E1E1E',
  card: '#2A2A2A',
  text: '#FFFFFF',
  textPrimary: '#FFFFFF', // Alias pour compatibilit√©
  textSecondary: '#B0B0B0',
  border: '#3A3A3A',
  accent: '#6C63FF' // Alias pour primary
};
